Generation VII.Sun: Its well-developed lower jaw and heavy fangs are its weapons. As long as it's not provoked, it rarely bites.
Generation VII.Moon: More timid than Snubbull, this Pokémon is doted on by young people amused at the contrast between its looks and its attitude.
Generation VII.Ultra Sun: While it has powerful jaws, it doesn't care for disputes, so it rarely has a chance to display their might.
Generation VII.Ultra Moon: Although it's popular with young people, Granbull is timid and sensitive, so it's totally incompetent as a watchdog.
